pageContext.claim: “I know [television networks] have to get licensed, and I can tell you that CNN — that ABC, most of them, but that NBC is very dishonest in its reporting of me. Very dishonest in its reporting of me.”
pageContext.analysis: News organizations operate in a competitive arena and mistakes are bound to be made. The key test is whether an error is acknowledged and corrected. In each of these cases, {the news organization} acknowledged and corrected it's mistake.
